briefTitle: 3D Breast Ultrasound Elastography in Patients Under Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy
officialTitle: Imagerie 3D d'élasticité du Sein Par échographie Ultrarapide au Cours d'un Traitement Par chimiothérapie néoadjuvante.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients having already undergone a breast MRI
* Patients presenting with breast lesions measuring between20-50mm in ultrasound

Exclusion Criteria:

* Multifocal lesions
* History of breast cancer
* Breast implants
* Inflammatory breast disease
* Pregnancy
